conversation_message.subject: Order Delay Inquiry
conversation_message.body: I placed an order three days ago (Order #12345), and it still hasn't shipped. Could you please update me on the status? I need the items by the end of this week.

parts.body: Hi Emily, we're sorry for the delay. I've checked your order, and it's scheduled for dispatch today. You'll receive a tracking number shortly. Thank you for your patience.

conversation_message.subject: Return Process Question
conversation_message.body: I received my order yesterday, but one of the items is not what I expected. Can you guide me through the return process?

parts.body: Hello Michael, I'm here to help. Please provide me with the order number and the item you wish to return. I'll send you the return instructions and process a return authorization for you.
